values: The parts of a coherent plan fit well together.
This was a coherent program for solving the flooding problem.
adj. working closely and well together 连贯的
adj. able to talk or express yourself in a clear way that can be easily understood 条理清楚的
orderly
adj. 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相耦合的；粘在一起的

adj. 条理清楚的，连贯的；前后一致的
